nodes.bodyText: why is this needed?

This method is used to CodeChallenge using Base64 and Base64 encoded string should not contain the following characters: "=", "+", or "/". you can find the details in the following link.
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7636#appendix-A
You are already using a no_padding strategy, so the result should not include the padding characters in the first place.

nodes.bodyText: why is this exception ignored?
JSONObject normally throws exception when trying to parse the json, but here we create the json manually and we know the values will always will be populated.
More reason to expose it when it happens :-)

Here it is safe to ignore the exception because the situations mentioned in the following link are never met here.
https://developer.android.com/reference/org/json/JSONException
